name: Invoice
comment: Maintains the following details:* Billing Arrangement s postpaid charges and credits that were created during the billing cycle period. * The document that was produced as a part of billing either for invoice or bill receivers.The bill statement entries display the billing arrangement due amount where the amount due is a sum of the amount due from the last bill statement, financial transactions that affect the balance, and the new amount due.
vf short description: Maintains the following details:* Billing Arrangement s postpaid charges and credits that were created during the billing cycle period. * The document that was produced as a part of billing either for invoice or bill receivers.

fields.name: InvoiceSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: InvoiceKey
fields.comment: Indicates a unique identifier for a record. //CES:BL1_INVOICE.INVOICE_SEQ_NO//Generated Key on Invoice Id//OptimaGenerated Key on Invoice Id and Invoice Reset Id

fields.name: BillingArrangementSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: PayChannelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: FinancialAccountSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CurrencySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: InvoiceCategoryTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BillingCycleInstanceSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: InvoiceId
fields.comment: Indicates a unique identifier for a record in the source. //CES:BL1_INVOICE.INVOICE_SEQ_NO//Optima:BILL_INVOICE.BILL_REF_NO

fields.name: InvoiceTotalAmount
fields.comment: Indicates the total of new charges and credits, including discounts, since the last invoice. This amount does not include taxes. //CES:BL1_INVOICE.TOTAL_INVOICE_AMT//Optima:CMF_BALANCE. NET_NEW_CHARGES

fields.name: InvoiceNetAmount
fields.comment: Indicates the total of new charges and credits, including discounts, since the last invoice. This amount does not include taxes. //CES:BL1_INVOICE.TOTAL_INVOICE_AMT - BL1_INVOICE.TAX_TOTAL_INV_AMT//Optima:CMF_BALANCE.NEW_CHARGES

fields.name: ItemizedTaxFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the tax was calculated for individual charges. Values are: Yes (Y) - The tax was calculated per charge. No (N) - The tax was calculated on accumulation amounts. BL1_INVOICE.ITEMIZED_TAX_IND

fields.name: PeriodCoverageStartDate
fields.comment: Indicates the start date of the billed period for the current invoice. //CES:BL1_INVOICE.  PRD_CVRG_STRT_DATE//Optima:BILL_INVOICE.FROM_DATE

fields.name: PeriodCoverageEndDate
fields.comment: Indicates the end date of the billed period for the current invoice. //CES:BL1_INVOICE.PRD_CVRG_END_DATE//Optima:BILL_INVOICE.TO_DATE

fields.name: StatementDate
fields.comment: Specifies the date on which the statement has been produced. //CES:CASEWHEN BL1_DOCUMENT.DOCUMENT_TYPE = "INV" THENBL1_INV_STATEMENT.STATEMENT_DATE ELSE BL1_BILL_STATEMENT.STATEMENT_DATEEND//Optima:BILL_INVOICE.STATEMENT_DATE

fields.name: DueDate
fields.comment: Indicates the last date allowed for the invoice statement or bill statement to be paid. //CES:CASEWHEN BL1_DOCUMENT.DOCUMENT_TYPE = "INV" THENBL1_INV_STATEMENT.DUE_DATEELSE BL1_BILL_STATEMENT.DUE_DATEEND//Optima:BILL_INVOICE.PAYMENT_DUE_DATE

fields.name: TotalDueAmount
fields.comment: Indicates the calculated amount to be paid. //CES:CASEWHEN BL1_DOCUMENT.DOCUMENT_TYPE = "INV" THENBL1_INV_STATEMENT.TOTAL_AMT_DUE ELSE BL1_BILL_STATEMENT.TOTAL_AMT_DUEEND//Optima:CMF_BALANCE.TOTAL_DUE

fields.name: LegalInvoiceNumber
fields.comment: Legal invoice number or the document number sent to the customer CASEWHEN BL1_DOCUMENT.DOCUMENT_TYPE = "INV" THENBL1_INV_STATEMENT.LEGAL_INVOICE_NO ELSE BL1_BILL_STATEMENT.LEGAL_INVOICE_NOEND

fields.name: DocumentStatusInd
fields.comment: Indicates the current status of the document. The billing status assigned to the document enables the invoicing processes and customer management representatives to track the production of each billing document.Example values for CES are:C - CALCULATED N - CONFIRMEDExample values for Optima are:0= incomplete1 = done2 = new, no activity3 = credit card hold4 = pro forma5 = suppressed (low balance) //CES:BL1_DOCUMENT.DOCUMENT_STATUS//Optima:BILL_INVOICE.PREP_STATUS

fields.name: DocumentTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates whether the billing document contains an invoice or a bill.Values are:BL - BILL IN - INVOICE BL1_DOCUMENT.DOCUMENT_TYPE

fields.name: DocumentFormatInd
fields.comment: Specifies the bill format, such as individual or business. BL1_DOCUMENT.DOCUMENT_FORMAT

fields.name: DocumentProductionTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the production type of the billing document, such as regular bill, first bill, final bill, or revised final bill. For example, some of the values are:DR - DROP FN - FINAL-BILL FR - FIRST-BILL RF - REVISED-FINAL RG - REGULAR-TYPE //CES:BL1_DOCUMENT.PRODUCTION_TYPE//Optima:BILL_INVOICE. SPECIAL_CODE

fields.name: DocumentProduceInd
fields.comment: Indicates whether the invoice is to be produced for the customer, such as a prepaid customer. BL1_DOCUMENT.DOC_PRODUCE_IND

fields.name: CycleRunDate
fields.comment: Specifies the date on which the billing period has started for the cycle, in which the invoice has been generated for the customer. //CES:Lookup in Billing Cycle Instance for Run Date based on BL1_INVOICE.CYCLE_SEQ_NO//Optima:BILL_INVOICE.PREP_DATE

fields.name: BssCreationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which the record was created in the source system. BL1_INVOICE.SYS_CREATION_DATE

fields.name: PreviousBalanceAmount
fields.comment: Indicates the total amount due from the previous statement. This amount is only applicable for bills. ///CES:BL1_BILL_STATEMENT.PREV_BALANCE_AMT//Optima:CMF_BALANCE. BALANCE_DUE

fields.name: DueAmountHandlingInd
fields.comment: Defines the special handling performed on the total due amount. Values are:-  ZERO_BALANCE (ZB) - Indicates that the total due amount was zeroed for the final document because the due amount was below the predefined minimum amount. - CARRY_OVER (CO) - Indicates that the due amount was not paid, and was carried to the next cycle.- EMPTY_STATEMENT (ES) - Indicates that either the account is cancelled or there is nothing to produce. CASEWHEN BL1_DOCUMENT.DOCUMENT_TYPE = "BILL" THEN BL1_BILL_STATEMENT.AMT_DUE_HANDLING ELSE BL1_INV_STATEMENT.AMT_DUE_HANDLINGEND

fields.name: OverPaymentAmount
fields.comment: Indicates the overpayment amount for invoices. For invoice receivers, the overpayment amount is reduced from total due amount. Only applicable for Invoice statement. BL1_INV_STATEMENT.OVERPYM_AMT

fields.name: FinancialActivitiesAmount
fields.comment: Indicates the total amount of the financial activities, including tax. This amount is applicable only for the bills. BL1_BILL_STATEMENT.TOTAL_FINANCE_ACT

fields.name: PreparedArBalanceAmount
fields.comment: Indicates the accounts receivable balance of the billing arrangement. This field is applicable only for the bill statements. BL1_BILL_STATEMENT.PREP_AR_BALANCE

fields.name: PaymentMethodCode
fields.comment: Indicates the Payment method. The values are:AT - ATM CA - CASH CC - CREDIT-CARD CH - CHEQUE DD - DIRECT-DEBIT //CES:CASEWHEN BL1_DOCUMENT.DOCUMENT_TYPE = "BILL" THEN BL1_BILL_STATEMENT.PAYMENT_METHOD ELSE BL1_INV_STATEMENT.PAYMENT_METHODEND//Optima:BILL_INVOICE.PAY_METHOD

fields.name: InvoiceTaxAmount
fields.comment: Indicates the total tax amount calculated for the new charges invoice and credits of the current invoice. BL1_INVOICE.TAX_TOTAL_INV_AMT

fields.name: PreviousPaymentDueDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date the payment was due for the previous bill. //Optima:BILL_INVOICE. PREV_PPDD

fields.name: PreviousBillingDate
fields.comment: This indicates actual end of previous billing period. //Optima:BILL_INVOICE. PREV_CUTOFF_DATE

fields.name: InvoiceResetId
fields.comment: This attribute indicates the reset counter value for bill_ref_no. //OptimaBILL_INVOICE.BILL_REF_RESETS

fields.name: TotalAmountPaid
fields.comment: This attribute indicates Net payments applied to the invoice. Includes prepayments appliedat time of invoice creation. This amount changes as payments oradjustments are made against the invoice. //Optima:CMF_BALANCE.TOTAL_PAID

fields.name: DisputeAmount
fields.comment: Amount of the invoice in dispute. //Optima:CMF_BALANCE. DISPUTE_AMT

fields.name: CollectionFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether an invoice is in collections. //Optima:CMF_BALANCE. COLLECTION_INDICATOR

fields.name: NonRecurringChargeFlag
fields.comment: This flag indicates were the non-recurring charges included in the interim bill? (1 = yes). //Optima:BILL_INVOICE. INCLUDE_NRC

fields.name: RecurringChargeFlag
fields.comment: This flag indicates were recurring charges calculated and included in the interim bill?(1 = yes). //Optima:BILL_INVOICE. INCLUDE_RC

fields.name: AdjustmentFlag
fields.comment: This flag indicates Were adjustments included in the interim bill? (1 = yes). //Optima:BILL_INVOICE. INCLUDE_ADJ

fields.name: UsageFlag
fields.comment: This flag indicates were usage charges included in the interim bill? (1 = yes). //Optima:BILL_INVOICE. INCLUDE_USAGE

fields.name: PaymentsFlag
fields.comment: This flag indicates were payments included in the interim bill? (1 = yes). //Optima:BILL_INVOICE. INCLUDE_BMF

fields.name: InterimBillFlag
fields.comment: This flag indicates Is this an invoice for an interim bill? (1 = yes). //Optima:BILL_INVOICE. INTERIM_BILL_FLAG

fields.name: BillOrderNumber
fields.comment: Indicates the Bill order number if external bill. //Optima:BILL_INVOICE. BILL_ORDER_NUMBER

fields.name: InitialBillFlag
fields.comment: Identifies whether this is an initial or final bill-1 = initial bill 0 = not initial or final bill>1 = number of attempts made to issue final bill //Optima:BILL_INVOICE. SPECIAL_CODE

fields.name: BillingCycleSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: InvoiceClosureDate
fields.comment: Date when the Invoice was closed (fully paid) select ARI. AR Invoice Status Change Date from Invoice I Left Join AR Invoice ARI Where ARI.AR Invoice Status Key= C and and ARI.Invoice Key= I.Invoice Key

fields.name: InvoicePaymentStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: InvoicePaymentConvergedStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: InvoicePaymentStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the status changed.

fields.name: InvoicePaymentConvergedStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the converged status changed.

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
